get.description: Retrieves the list of application dependencies.
Retrieves the list of peer dependencies.

Application.description: Definition of a Status Board application.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Application' if this is a complete object or 'ApplicationLink' if it is just a link.

fullname.description: The full name of the application.

product.description: The group ID that the application belongs to.

ApplicationDependency.description: Definition of a Status Board application dependency.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'ApplicationDependency' if this is a complete object or 'ApplicationDependencyLink' if it is just a link.

application.description: The parent Application of the dependency.

owners.description: The application dependency owners (name and email)

service.description: The Service associated with the dependency.

type.description: The type of application dependency, e.g. soft or hard.

Error.description: Definition of a Status Board error.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Error' if this is a complete object or 'ErrorLink' if it is just a link.

Owner.description: Definition of a Status Board owner.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Owner' if this is a complete object or 'OwnerLink' if it is just a link.

PeerDependency.description: Definition of a Status Board peer dependency.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'PeerDependency' if this is a complete object or 'PeerDependencyLink' if it is just a link.

metadata.description: Miscellaneous metadata about the peer dependency.

name.description: The name of the peer dependency.

owners.description: The peer dependency owners (name and email)

services.description: Services associated with the peer dependency.

Product.description: Definition of a Status Board product.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Product' if this is a complete object or 'ProductLink' if it is just a link.

Service.description: Definition of a Status Board Service.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Service' if this is a complete object or 'ServiceLink' if it is just a link.

application.description: The Application associated with the Service

ServiceDependency.description: Definition of a Status Board service dependency.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'ServiceDependency' if this is a complete object or 'ServiceDependencyLink' if it is just a link.

metadata.description: Miscellaneous metadata about the service dependency.

name.description: The name of the service dependency.

owners.description: The service dependency owners (name and email)

type.description: The type of service dependency, e.g. soft or hard.

ServiceInfo.description: Definition of a Status Board service info.

Status.description: Definition of a Status Board status.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Status' if this is a complete object or 'StatusLink' if it is just a link.

status.description: A status message for the given service.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'StatusUpdate' if this is a complete object or 'StatusUpdateLink' if it is just a link.

status.description: A status message for the given service.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will always be 'Error'

code.description: Globally unique code of the error, composed of the unique identifier of the API and the numeric identifier of the error. For example, for if the numeric identifier of the error is `93` and the identifier of the API is `clusters_mgmt` then the code will be `CLUSTERS-MGMT-93`.

reason.description: Human readable description of the error.
